lines.text: Well, he could be a <c=#0000FF>Stop Wizard,</c> but we can't really tell for sure.
Thanks to Dr. Whydah being a stickler, we can't check his back for <c=#FF00FF>tattoos.</c>
I guess he's the only wizard here who could have cast that Living Memory spell...
...but I don't think that's enough to say for sure.
We already know there was one Stop Wizard on the scene, anyway.
So he's gotta be the other type, right?
Well, not necessarily. He might not be any specific type at all.
We'll need something more solid to say for sure that he's a <c=#FF0000>Go Wizard.</c>
So there's not really any evidence pointing to him being able to use <c=#0000FF>Stop Wizard</c> spells.
It's possible, but let's keep investigating.
